creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description:
[K-27]

wrapped in tissue inside of a wooden box with inscription both outside and inside of lid; wooden box inside of a paper box with light blue foliage printed on the inside and a ribbed green/grey fabric on the outside; image of three tall skinny trees that are divided by a path; single figure on path under a full moon or sun; inscription in UL corner; support is moss green/tan/cream with gold and roller knobs are ivory
title: Landscape
